item.description:
How to Work With Angels to Prepare for These Times of Great Change: Developing Your Internal GPS

Tuesdays August 28th - September 4th, 11th and 18th (This is a 4 week session)

7pm - 9pm

Cost for this course is $275.00 (Save $50.00 on early bird registration before August 25th.)

Presented By Patricia Rainville....Patricia has been in the health and wellness business for 20 years. It began in 1990 with massage school where I found my true calling in the fields of alternative medicines and energies. While there I became interested in Reiki healing energy and became a reiki master. I also became interested in aromatherapy and herbs as a way to enhance healing and spent a season apprenticing with an herbalist.

In this class we will learning about specific Archangels to work with, as well as developing/enhancing our spiritual and intuitive abilities known as the "clairs". We will also be learning to develop our skills of non-verbal or telepathic communication.

Please call Pat at 508-524-8208 to register for the class

Email solsticehealing@yahoo.com or Call 508-533-0669 with any questions
item.name: How to Work With Angels to Prepare for These Times of Great Change
